title: Distance Language Education Design Utilizing a Constructivist-Positivist Integrated Model

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory educational theory and digital teaching tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training courses for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Compare and explain the core principles of constructivist and objectivist theories.
Design a distance learning curriculum for language education by applying a hybrid model.
Implement at least three strategies to promote learner interaction in real-time online environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
